dataList.data: The Geek culture has been on the rise in India, with the country becoming one of the biggest markets for tech and gaming. Geeks in India are typically interested in various areas, including technology, science, gaming, comics, anime, and more. With the rise of the internet, many geeks in India have found communities to share their interests, discuss ideas, and collaborate on projects.

Technology is a significant area of interest for Indian geeks, and the country has become a hub for tech startups and innovation. Many Indian geeks are interested in programming, software development, cybersecurity, and other areas related to technology.

Gaming is also an increasingly popular area of interest among Indian geeks, with the country being one of the biggest markets for mobile games. Many Indian gamers also enjoy PC and console games and participate in online communities to discuss games, strategies, and mods.

Overall, the geek culture in India is thriving, with many passionate individuals and communities sharing their interests and driving innovation. Here we are trying a tiny effort to provide meaningfull isights of technology basics for Java, Design patterns, Algorithms etc.
